ABOUT THE FLICK

Tagline: Love knows no borders

The story of a married silkworm merchant-turned-smuggler
in 19th century France traveling to Japan for his town\\\&#039;s
supply of silkworms after a disease wipes out their
African supply. During his stay in Japan, he becomes
obsessed with the concubine of a local baron
